name: FxWallet
description: FxWallet is a fully decentralized multi-cryptocurrency blockchain wallet. It is a mobile wallet. Currently supporting 50+ public chains, it also offers the ability to custom add Ethereum-based public chains and tokens. User-friendly for beginners, it features an NFT management DApp browser, supports asset staking, and prioritizes network security.
short_description: FxWallet is a fully decentralized multi-cryptocurrency blockchain wallet.
